title: study
content: can someone tell if they will ask questions about computer hardware and software in the isa.the teacher thought us stuff like speaker is an output device,do we have to learn all that or should we just start with programs? are only programming and python related questions asked in isa?

comments.body: If you're referring to Python, then yes they'll only ask programming related questions
so there wont be anything like computer hardware and all right?
It's a programming course, so nope. Refer to past years question papers if you have any more doubts.
where can i find the papers?
even for the 1st isa we wont have any questions related to hardware? only programming?
